channel.title: Making weapon range based
channel.description:
So, i have been trying to add toxic blowpipe for awhile now and i managed to do it.
Now, how do i change it to range based? I can figure out the whole dart system myself, that isnt a problem but i have added toxic blowpipe to my bows int[] as a test yet it it still melee based.
Pics: [img]http://i.imgur.com/sCPH3SB.png[/img] [img]http://prntscr.com/78v63d[/img]

item.title: Making weapon range based
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:551640”][quote author=FoHammer link=topic=670554.msg4483881#msg4483881 date=1432536202]

I can help you, I believe you have me on skype. I’m Tim

Supply help on this board or not at all.
[hr]

Generally, I’d use the rune crossbow as an example. Search for it’s ID in the combat assistant, then add an exception for your blowpipe each time.

Anyone can supply their help how they want. This board is to find someone to help wether it’s on here or not. I mentioned skype because we’re already friends on it, and I can help him do it instead of telling him how. It’s more efficient for learning.
[/quote]
The point of the board is for people to get help on the board. And for other users to be able to search for their issue and be able to find a solution on past help topics.

It’d be rather difficult to find a solution if every help topic was answered by “Add me on skype”[/quote]

He’d be getting help either way, over the board or skype, but I get what you’re saying.

Read full topic
